reviewText:
It just amazing in every aspect!
This is the most fascinating (Coptic) movie I ever watched! Huge production, inspiring and motivating story, phenomenal performance by the main actor (Fared Elnoqrashi) to the extent that you forget that this is someone acting and believe you are watching Fr. Feltaous himself, excellent job by director and sound effects, and the songs are so touchy.

Fr. Feltaous Elsouriani story is so inspiring and motivating. The movie highlights many good moral and Christian values in a very simple delightful way. For example, humility and simplicity of Fr. Feltaous is emphasized in several scenes in a gentle way (as opposed to classical *preaching* ways of older coptic movies).

I am definitely enjoying this movie, it worth more than the money paid. I will watch it again and over.
Very  good movies I recommend this to everybody
The Glory of God in His Saints
It's amazing movie I have ever seen.

I ENJOYED THE MOVIE. EXCELLENT JOB. AMAZING PRODUCTION. VERY INSPIRING. YOU DID NOT FEEL IT IS A MOVIE BUT REAL. WE NEED MORE OF THIS KIND OF MOVIES. YOU LEARN A LOT ABOUT ALL THOSE SAINTS AND THEIR LIFE. MY GOD BLESS EVERYONE THAT HELP IN THE PRODUCTION,ACTING, AND WORKED PROMOTE AND SELLING THE FILM, THEIR REWARD WILL BE GREAT.
Father faltaous life story is amazing ,the movie is an excellent production and amazing work .
